original: Johansson, Reimer Napoleon, landshövding, Halmstad, f. 17/11/93 i Norrby, Västmanl. 1., av K. A. J. o. Ellen Eriksson. G. 1. 16 m. Elsa Maria Eriksson, d. 44; 2. 46 m. fil. dr Karin Breimer. Barn: Gerd f. 17, Stig 21, Bengt 26. — Folkhögsk., lantm:sk. Lantbr. i Norrby, äg. t. Norrbäck v. Sala, släktgård under mer än 300 år i rakt nedstigande led, lands-hövd. i Hall. 1. sed. 43. Ordf. i 43 års mejeriutredn., tidigare ordf. i Sv:es lantbr :f’örb., Mejeriernas riksfören. o. Lantmännens Mjölikförsäljn :fören. i Sthlm, v. ordf. i livsmed :komm. 40-43’, led. aiv ’stait. priskontr :nd, ordf. i kom-mind i Norrby o. i polis- o. sjukv:-distr., led. av benisin- o. oljend 40 o. 42 års statl. jordibr ikomm., led. av styr. f. stat. lantfbr :k:em. ansit. o. Riksförb. f. Sv:es försv. KNO’, RVO.
translated: Johansson, Reimer Napoleon, county governor, Halmstad, b. 17/11/93 in Norrby, Västmanland, son of K.A.J. and Ellen Eriksson. Married 1. in 1916 to Elsa Maria Eriksson, who died in 1944; 2. in 1946 to Karin Breimer, PhD. Children: Gerd b. 1917, Stig b. 1921, Bengt b. 1926. Educated at a folk high school and agricultural college. Farmer in Norrby, owner of Norrbäck in Sala, a family farm for over 300 years, descended in a direct line. County governor in Halland since 1943. Chairman of the Dairy Commission in 1943, former chairman of the Swedish Farmers' Union, the National Dairy Association and the Milk Sales Association in Stockholm. Deputy chairman of the Food Commission from 1940-43, member of the State Price Contract Commission, chairman of the Norrby district committee and the police and health committee. Member of the State Petroleum and Oil Committee in 1940 and 1942, member of the State Agriculture Chemical Committee, and the Board of the National Association of Swedish Defence. Knight of the Order of the North Star, Royal Order of Vasa.

hasOccupation.name: Ordförande i Lantmännens Mjölikförsäljn :fören. i Sthlm
